episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley prepare for their epic adventure, including lessons for kidnap avoidance, fitness training, first aid instruction and vaccinations.
episodes.title: Preparation

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley continue to make preparations for their trip, heading for Wales for some much-needed off-road motorcycle training.
episodes.title: Showing Off

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley make their first extended stop in Prague, before continuing to the Ukrainian border where a crossing turns into a 12-hour nightmare.
episodes.title: London to Volgograd

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley are in for a fright after one of the locals points a gun at them, followed by riding on one of worst-kept roads in the world.
episodes.title: Kazakhstan

episodes.synopsis: After the dilapidated roads the pair experienced in Kazakhstan, Ewan and Charley are disheartened when they find no roads at all en route to Mongolia.
episodes.title: Barnaul to Western Mongolia

episodes.synopsis: The team is forced to buy crew member Claudio a new bike, and in Mongolia, Ewan and Charley are taken on a tour of the sewers.
episodes.title: Western Mongolia to Yakutsk

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley run into some difficulty in Siberia, with unwelcoming locals, impassable rivers, collapsed bridges and a lack of food.
episodes.title: Yakutsk to Magadan

episodes.synopsis: Damage to the bikes causes a delay in Alaska. Ewan and Charley marvel at the Alaskan wildlife before heading towards Canada.
episodes.title: Anchorage to Calgary

episodes.synopsis: On the final leg of the journey to New York City, Ewan and Charley are involved in collisions with cars.
episodes.title: Calgary to New York

video.title: Long Way Round
video.synopsis: Join actor friends Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman for a 20,000-mile, 115-day motorcycle journey across the world from London to New York.
